description: Base 12 complement of n (write n in base 12, then replace each digit by its base 12 negative).
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..20735 (20735 = 12^4 - 1)
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
prog: (Haskell)a055122 0 = 0a055122 n = if d == 0 then 12 * a055122 n' else 12 * a055122 n' + 12 - d            where (n', d) = divMod n 12-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 12 2014
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Apr 19 2000
